name: Xenabsorber
description: The Xenabsorber is a blue crystalline aberration that excels in deception and impersonation. It can mimic the physical traits and attacks of other creatures.
memorable: Its unique ability to disguise itself and mimic traits makes it a tricky and unpredictable opponent in both combat and social settings.
goals: To deceive and impersonate other creatures, using its mimicry to gain advantages in encounters.
relations: Can be found in the company of other aberrations or creatures that value trickery.
environment: Typically found in chaotic or unpredictable environments, where it can blend into various scenarios.
strengths: Good physical capabilities with high strength and a strong ability to deceive.
weaknesses: Reliance on observing traits to maintain its mimicry; it reverts to its true form if it fails to observe new traits over a week.
attacks: Capable of executing two melee attacks, primarily using a slam attack that deals bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Trait Mimicry allows it to temporarily adopt the physical traits and attacks of other creatures, enhancing versatility.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, making it adept at noticing details in its environment.
skills: Proficient in deception and perception, allowing it to trick others and observe its surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Has advantage on Deception checks when impersonating other creatures.
Can mimic up to five traits, with a maximum of two being attacks.
Known for its chaotic nature and unpredictable behavior.
